Package Game

Class TrylmaRules

java.lang.Object
Game.TrylmaRules
All Implemented Interfaces:
Rules
public class TrylmaRules extends Object implements Rules
Game rules After current player first click it maps all available fields player can move to from the field he selected. Based on that, after second click it checks if the move is correct. It also can check if player won.

    • moveIsCorrect

      public boolean moveIsCorrect​(Board board, int endMoveField)
      Description copied from interface: Rules
      Rule set that determines if given move is correct. Checks if selected field is in Available fields. It is checked after second click by current player.
      Specified by:
      moveIsCorrect in interface Rules
      Parameters:
      board - the game board in current state
      endMoveField - the field player is trying to move to
      Returns:
      true if move is correct
